data.reason: Mimics prior WON TIER 2 momentum pattern with BTC stable: 24h gain +3.6% (>3%), RSI 60.5 (60–70 HOT band), MACD effectively flat-to-bullish with 1H STRONG_BUY and strong volume; other candidates either fall into previously losing Tier 1-style logic (TAO, CBETH) or hotter/chasey Tier 2 profiles that resemble recent LOSERS (FET, PENDLE). Using 40% of 30.77 per TIER 2 sizing rule.
